content.statement: aku-t08-string-theory-planck-scale is a fundamental concept in Natural-Sciences Physics Quantum-Mechanics Planck-Units that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding aku-t08-string-theory-planck-scale helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of aku-t08-string-theory-planck-scale include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of aku-t08-string-theory-planck-scale.

string_length.relationship: ℓ_s ≈ g_s^(1/4) · ℓ_P where g_s is string coupling

string_tension.meaning: Energy per unit length of string

t_duality.description: Fundamental equivalence between large and small radii
t_duality.physical_meaning: Compactifying a dimension on a circle of radius R gives same physics as radius ℓ_s²/R
t_duality.implication: Minimum observable length is ℓ_s - can't go smaller because it maps to larger
t_duality.example: R = ℓ_s/2 is equivalent to R = 2ℓ_s; minimum is at R = ℓ_s

graviton_from_strings.description: Gravity emerges naturally from string theory
graviton_from_strings.mechanism: Closed string massless modes include spin-2 particle = graviton
graviton_from_strings.significance: First theory to naturally include quantum gravity
graviton_from_strings.comparison: Point-particle QFT must add gravity by hand and gets infinities

extra_dimensions.compactification: Extra 6-7 dimensions curled up at ~ℓ_s scale
extra_dimensions.observable_effect: Modify Newton's law at very short distances; influence particle spectrum

connection_to_planck_units.meaning: String theory predicts minimum length without assuming it
String uncertainty naturally gives GUP form

experimental_status.direct_tests: Currently impossible - would require Planck-scale energies
experimental_status.indirect_tests: Extra dimensions (not seen at LHC), cosmic string signatures, gravitational wave patterns
experimental_status.current_limits: LHC excludes extra dimensions larger than ~10⁻¹⁸ m (still 10¹⁷× above ℓ_P)

definitions_glossary.concept: A fundamental idea or notion in the domain
definitions_glossary.property: A characteristic or attribute of an entity
definitions_glossary.relationship: A connection or association between concepts

definition.@value: How string theory naturally incorporates a minimum length scale, predicts graviton emergence, and connects to Planck physics

prerequisites.title: GUP
prerequisites.reason: Strings provide physical origin for GUP

related.relationship: String length is a minimum length

learning_objectives: Understand how strings provide natural minimum length
Explain T-duality and why R < ℓ_s maps to R > ℓ_s
Recognize graviton as closed string mode
Appreciate connection between string length and Planck length
common_errors: Thinking string theory is experimentally verified
Missing that T-duality makes 'smaller than ℓ_s' meaningless
Confusing string length with string thickness
physics_insights: Gravity emerges naturally from strings - first theory to do this!
T-duality: R < ℓ_s is physically identical to ℓ_s²/R > ℓ_s
String uncertainty naturally gives GUP without assuming it
Extra dimensions are required for consistency, not optional
